001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.TrainableFunction;
005
006/**
007 * A scalar-valued function that is both {@link TrainableFunction} and
008 * {@link ScalarEstimationFunction}.
009 * <p>
010 * Implementations represent functions {@code f(x; θ)} with trainable parameters θ
011 * that produce a scalar output for a given input vector. This interface provides
012 * a way to compute parameter parameterGradients needed for training via backpropagation.
013 */
014@Strategy(Strategy.Role.INTERFACE)
015public interface TrainableScalarFunction<N extends Number> extends TrainableFunction<N>, ScalarEstimationFunction<N> {
016
017    /**
018     * Calculates the parameterGradients of the scalar function with respect to its
019     * trainable parameters, given the input values.
020     *
021     * @param inputs the input feature vector to the function
022     * @return an array of partial derivatives
023     * {@code ∂f/∂θ_k} for each parameter θ_k
024     */
025    N[] calculateParameterGradients(N[] inputs);
026
027}
